text: Kashchey the Immortal () is a 1945 Soviet fantasy movie directed by Aleksandr Rou.КАРО.Арт и Киностудия Горького объявили о старте ретроспективы Александра РоуКащей Бессмертный (1944) It stars Sergei Stolyarov, Alexander Shirshov, and Galina Grigorieva. == Actors == * Sergei Stolyarov as Nikita Kozhemyaka * Alexander Shirshov as Bulat Balagur * Galina Grigorieva as Maria Morevna * Georgy Millyar as Kashchey the Immortal / magician * Ivan Ryzhov as naughty boy * Sergei Troitsky as sultan == References == ==Other websites== * Category:1945 movies Category:1940s fantasy movies Category:Soviet fantasy movies Category:Movies directed by Aleksandr Rou
title: Kashchey the Immortal (movie)
